outputs.output_descr: Integrated Water Resources Management (IWRM) is operationalized across southern Africa, and contributes to environmentally, economically and socially sustainable development. The priject also conducts a number of demonstration/pilot project around the country on rainwater harvesting and grey-water recycling. The main output of the project is to develop a National IWRM Plan/Water Efficiency Plan.

project_descr: PIMS 3362 IW MSP:Integrated Water Resources Management
project_title: Integrated Water Resources Management for Southern Afric
